DOC.brief_title: Project Impact : A Culturally-Tailored Adherence Intervention Latino Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: If participant decides take part study , complete questionnaire ( age , preferred language , education level ) smoking habit . This questionnaire take 10-15 minute complete . After participant completes questionnaire , interview researcher . During interview participant ask discuss variety topic related smoking quitting , experience attempt quit smoke problem may . This interview last 1 hour . The interview audio-recorded . Participant 's interview answer later transcribe ( write ) without name identify information . Study participation complete interview . This investigational study . Up 48 people enrol study . All take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18+ year age 2 . Current smoker ( > 10 cigarette per day past 3 month ) recently quit Smoking ( within past year ) smoke past 2 month ) 3 . Read , understand speak Spanish 4 . Identify Latino ( Hispanic ) heritage , ethnicity , ancestry . 1 . The selfreport diagnosis Schizophrenia , Delusional Disorder , Schizoaffective Disorder Bipolar Disorder past year . 2 . The selfreport diagnosis Substance Dependence Disorder Nicotine past year ( i.e. , Alcohol Dependence , Amphetamine Dependence , Cannabis Dependence , Cocaine Dependence , Hallucinogen Dependence , Inhalant Dependence , Opioid Dependence , Phencyclidine Dependence , Sedatives , Hypnotics , Anxiolytic Dependence , Polysubstance Dependence ) 3 . Unavailable 1.5 hour visit MD Anderson Cancer Center .
